ygData.subject: Archery
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings, Well, I have decided to learn how to fletch and take up Archery... Fletching is to say the least boring but I have my skill up to 21 now *yawns*.
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings,

Well, I have decided to learn how to fletch and take up Archery...
Fletching is to say the least boring but I have my skill up to 21 now
*yawns*. From what I have read, at 35 points I should be able to make a
bow *grins*, but until then what do I buy to practice my skill with. The
arrows I have made so far have a 50, 100, 125 range on them.

I figure while getting my strenght back after battling the critters,
fletching would be a good pass time. *shrugs* and archery will help me
pull from a distance.

Any advice is appreciated,

Azlana
